title: farm_gate_closed_end_of_day
summary: Closing the farm gate after completion of daily operations.
description: This data unit documents the closure of the farm gate after daily work was completed. The action marks the end-of-day operational state for zones FZ-03 and FZ-04, ensuring controlled access and system continuity.

reference_context.note: Proof 569 documents the gate opening earlier in the same day.

external_reference.note: External image reference for independent verification.
